message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you, even more so than the asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $20,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for it. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I value your offer, the product's worth is closer to my initial price. Could you consider $17,000?
I understand your perspective, but $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $15,500. Can you consider that?
